Class CoffeeModel

java.lang.Object
CoffeeModel
public class CoffeeModel extends Object
CoffeModel handles the storage, verification, and retrieval of user accounts

    • recoverUserList

      public void recoverUserList()
      recoverUserList recovers user list from a file. Called initially by CoffeCart to init application.

    • addUser

      public void addUser(String username, String password, boolean userType) throws IllegalArgumentException
      addUser adds a uesr to the list of user accounts.
      Parameters:
      username - Valid String username
      password - Valid String password
      userType - 0 for customer, 1 for merchant
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the username already exists.

    • loginUser

      public void loginUser(String username, String password) throws NoSuchElementException
      loginUser logs a user in by username and password.
      Parameters:
      username - valid String username
      password - valid String password
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if there is no associated account
